name: Update-Azure-AD-Application
description: Update the properties given of an Azure AD Application
author: Ralph Jansen

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running PowerShell.

inputs.name: objectId
inputs.label: Object Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Application object Id of the Azure AD Application.

inputs.name: resourceAccessFilePath
inputs.label: Required Resource Access
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Json file with array of Required resource Access. The format should be the same as in the manifest.

So in example:
[ { "resourceAppId": "00000002-0000-0000-c000-000000000000", "resourceAccess": [ { "id": "5778995a-e1bf-45b8-affa-663a9f3f4d04", "type": "Role" }, { "id": "cba73afc-7f69-4d86-8450-4978e04ecd1a", "type": "Scope" } ] }, { "resourceAppId": "00000003-0000-0000-c000-000000000000", "resourceAccess": [ { "id": "7b2449af-6ccd-4f4d-9f78-e550c193f0d1", "type": "Role" } ] } ]

inputs.name: appRolesFilePath
inputs.label: AppRoles
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Json file with array of AppRoles. The format should be the same as in the manifest.

So in example:
[ { "allowedMemberTypes": [ "Application" ], "description": "Ability to delete all users", "displayName": "Delete All Users", "id": "829efba8-0659-40be-8a4a-cb338271ef9d", "isEnabled": true, "lang": null, "origin": "Application", "value": "Users.Delete.All" } ]

outputVariables.name: ObjectId
outputVariables.description: The ObjectId of the Azure AD Application

outputVariables.name: ApplicationId
outputVariables.description: The ApplicationId of the Azure AD Application

outputVariables.name: Name
outputVariables.description: The Name of the Azure AD Application

outputVariables.name: AppIdUri
outputVariables.description: The App Id Uri of the Azure AD Application

outputVariables.name: HomePageUrl
outputVariables.description: The Home page URL of the Azure AD Application

outputVariables.name: ServicePrincipalObjectId
outputVariables.description: The ObjectId of the Service Principal connected to the Azure AD Application
